skins.shipDescription: Um... Are you the Commander? Oh, perfect! It's nice to meet you. My name is Honoka! I don't know how much I'll be able to help, but... let's be friends!
skins.selfIntroduction: An introduction? My name is Honoka. I love my Grammy! Also... I really like pro wrestling! I watch it on TV a lot and act out the scenes. I'm super good at imitations! The other day I broke my TV... Oh, um... promise me... you won't tell anyone.
skins.acquisition: Um... Are you the Commander? Oh, perfect! It's nice to meet you. My name is Honoka! I don't know how much I'll be able to help, but... let's be friends!
skins.login: Good work, Commander! Wait, you're starting work now?
skins.details: Dinner, a bath, or... me? What will you have? Hehe~ Okay, then let's go play!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I learned a lot of things from Marie today!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Yaaawn... Everything's so fuzzy... I-I'm not asleep!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander! Um... Is there anything I can help out with?
skins.secretaryTouch: Eh? Would you... like me to help?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Eep! Wh-whoa... There's a limit to what you can get away with, Commander!
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Hehehe, this makes me feel happy...

skins.shipDescription: Whoa, the sea is so pretty~! It's as beautiful as the Venus Islands! I'm so blown away, I don't even feel the heat anymore!
skins.acquisition: Whoa, the sea is so pretty~! It's as beautiful as the Venus Islands! I'm so blown away, I don't even feel the heat anymore!
skins.login: The sun's shining brightly today! Let's go play in the ocean~!
skins.details: This swimsuit might be a bit too revealing... It took some courage to put it on... Um, how... is it?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hmm... I wonder if there's a crab under this rock?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Marie! Let's play beach volleyball together!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Don't forget to do your stretches! Come on, Commander, you should join me~ One, two, one two...
skins.secretaryTouch: Whew... Oh, Commander, are you tired? Why don't you take a break?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: There's a limit to what I'll let you get away with, Commander!
